entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gogama
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:57 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 late in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 29. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
